info.help_text:
This report aims to monitor the Iub resource usage. It provides information about both IP and ATM resources.

Use case specific instructions:
This report is design for Iub performance monitoring, thus to provide meaningful data it must be always triggered for the RWBTS level. RWBTS level is used to filter the ATM and IP interfaces, among all the possible interfaces, that are Iub related.

RNC_1791a.ui_name: HSDPA Alloc conn res FR, CAC

RNC_1792a.ui_name: HSDPA Alloc conn res FR, extCAC

M800C7.ui_name: HSDPA Alloc conn res Fails, extCAC

RNC_1793a.ui_name: HSDPA Alloc conn res FR, intCAC

M800C8.ui_name: HSDPA Alloc conn res Fails, intCAC

kpi.name: RNC_5005a
kpi.formula:
decode( (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other),0,null,
(100*(ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res) / (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Accessibility for outgoing traffic
kpi_info.use: The transport resource request success ratio [%]. This KPI describes the average success rate of the transport resource reservation attempts for IP Route based connections every/selected interface where IP is used.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Accessibility for outgoing traffic

kpi.name: RNC_1779a
kpi.formula:
decode( (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other),0,null,
(100*(ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int) / (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Connection Admission Control rejections
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the RNC due to connection admission control, which includes external and internal connections.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Connection Admission Control rejections

kpi.name: RNC_1780a
kpi.formula:
decode( (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other),0,null,
(100*(ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext) / (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC External Connection Admission Control rejections
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the RNC due to external connection admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC External Connection Admission Control rejections

kpi_info.title: FAIL_RNC_IP_RES_EXT
kpi_info.use: The number of failed IP transport resource reservations in the RNC due to external connection admission control. UPDATED: When the RNC external IP connection admission control rejects the resource request.

kpi.name: RNC_1781a
kpi.formula:
decode( (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other),0,null,
(100*(ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int) / (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Internal Connection Admission Control rejections
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the RNC due to internal connection admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Internal Connection Admission Control rejections

kpi_info.title: FAIL_RNC_IP_RES_INT
kpi_info.use: The number of failed IP transport resource reservations in the RNC due to internal connection admission control. UPDATED: When the RNC internal IP connection admission control rejects the resource request.

kpi.name: RNC_1782a
kpi.formula:
decode( (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other),0,null,
(100*(ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other) / (ipcac.succ_rnc_ip_res + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_ext + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_int + ipcac.fail_rnc_ip_res_other)))

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Other rejection than Connection Admission Control
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the RNC due to other reason than connection admission control failure.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - RNC Other rejection than Connection Admission Control

kpi_info.title: FAIL_RNC_IP_RES_OTHER
kpi_info.use: The number of failed IP transport resource reservations in the RNC due to other than connection admission control reasons. UPDATED: When the IP resource reservation fails due to any reason other than connection admission control failure. Such a reason could be for example route analysis failure caused by a configuration error.

kpi_info.title: IP Route Accessibility in BTS
kpi_info.use: The transport IP resource reservation success ratio in BTS [%]. This KPI describes the average success rate of the IP transport resource reservation attempts for IP Route based connections in BTS.

kpi.name: RNC_1784a

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - BTS External Connection Admission Control rejections
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the BTS due to external connection admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - BTS External Connection Admission Control rejections

kpi_info.title: FAIL_BTS_IP_RES_EXT_TRANS
kpi_info.use: The number of failed IP transport resource reservations in the BTS due to external connection admission control. UPDATED: When the BTS returns Transport Layer cause 'Transport resources Unavailable' in NBAP: Radio Link Setup Failure or NBAP: Radio Link Reconfiguration Failure.

kpi.name: RNC_1785a

kpi_info.title: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - BTS Other rejection than Connection Admission Control
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the IP route resource reservations failure rate in the BTS due to other reason than connection admission control failure.

kpi.kpi_alias: IP Route Resource Reservations Failure Ratio - BTS Other rejection than Connection Admission Control

kpi_info.title: FAIL_BTS_IP_RES_OTHER_TRANS
kpi_info.use: The number of failed IP transport resource reservations in the BTS due to some other transport related failure. UPDATED: When the BTS returns Transport Layer cause 'Unspecified' in NBAP: Radio Link Setup Failure or NBAP: Radio Link Reconfiguration Failure.

kpi_info.title: IP Iub throughput - egress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the RNC Iub IP layer downlink throughput in RNC.

kpi_info.title: IP Iub throughput - ingress
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the RNC Iub IP layer uplink throughput in RNC.

kpi.name: RNC_602a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other),0,null,
(100*((aalrr.aal2_succeeded) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other))))

kpi_info.title: AAL2 connection reservation success rate
kpi_info.use: The transport resource request success ratio [%]. This KPI describes the average success rate of the transport resource reservation attempts for AAL2 type connections. The low success rate increases the number of unsuccessful RAB setups and requires further troubleshooting in transport layer.

kpi_info.title: AAL2 connection requests
kpi_info.use: The total number of AAL2 connection requests

kpi.name: RNC_767a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other),0,null,
100*(aalrr.res_ext_cap) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other))

kpi_info.title: Blocking due to RNC external capacity ratio
kpi_info.use: Transport resource reservations rejected because of the lack of RNC-external AAL2 resources. Transport resources requests which are rejected by CAC since there is not enough capacity in the external AAL2 path.
kpi_info.formula:
100* sum(RES_EXT_CAP)
------------
sum(AAL2_SUCCEEDED+
AAL2_REJECTED+
RES_EXT_CAP+
RES_INT_CAP+
RES_OTHER )

kpi.kpi_alias: Blocking due to RNC external capacity ratio

kpi_info.title: RES_EXT_CAP
kpi_info.use: The number of transport resource reservations rejected because of the lack of RNC-external AAL2 resources. This is the number of transport resources requests which are rejected by CAC since there is not enough capacity in the external AAL2 path. UPDATED:When resource request is rejected because of RNC-external AAL2 resources.

kpi.name: RNC_766a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other),0,null,
100*(aalrr.res_int_cap) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other))

kpi_info.title: Blocking due to RNC internal capacity ratio
kpi_info.use: Transport resource reservations rejected because of the lack of RNC-internal capacity. Resource reservations which are rejected by CAC since there are no RNC-internal AAL2 processing resources available.
kpi_info.formula:
100* sum(RES_INT_CAP)
-------------
sum(AAL2_SUCCEEDED+
AAL2_REJECTED+
RES_EXT_CAP+
RES_INT_CAP+
RES_OTHER )

kpi.kpi_alias: Blocking due to RNC internal capacity ratio

kpi_info.title: RES_INT_CAP
kpi_info.use: The number of transport resource reservations rejected because of the lack of RNC-internal capacity. This is the number of resource reservations which are rejected by CAC since there are no RNC-internal AAL2 processing resources available. UPDATED:When resource request is rejected because of RNC-internal AAL2 resources.

kpi.name: RNC_768a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other),0,null,
100*(aalrr.aal2_rejected) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded + aalrr.aal2_rejected + aalrr.res_ext_cap + aalrr.res_int_cap + aalrr.res_other))

kpi_info.title: Blocking due to ALCAP Signaling failure ratio
kpi_info.use: The ratio of AAL2 resource reservations which have failed due to ALCAP signalling
kpi_info.formula:
100* sum(AAL2_REJECTED)
---------------
sum(AAL2_SUCCEEDED+
AAL2_REJECTED+
RES_EXT_CAP+
RES_INT_CAP+
RES_OTHER )

kpi.kpi_alias: Blocking due to ALCAP Signaling failure ratio

kpi_info.title: AAL2_REJECTED
kpi_info.use: The number of AAL2 signaling requests, which failed for any reason. UPDATED:When the AAL2 signalling fails for any reason.

kpi.name: RNC_765b
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa + aalrr.reject_hsdpa_too_many_users),0,null,
100*(aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa + aalrr.reject_hsdpa_too_many_users))

kpi_info.title: Shared HSDPA reservations success ratio
kpi_info.use: Shared HSDPA reservations (SHA) success ratio, not relevant if HSDPA uses dedicated VCC
kpi_info.formula:
100* sum(AAL2_SUCCEEDED_HSDPA)
----------------------------
sum(AAL2_SUCCEEDED_HSDPA+
TRANSPORT_REJECTED_EXT_HSDPA+
TRANSPORT_REJECTED_INT_HSDPA+
OTHER_REJECTED_HSDPA+
REJECT_HSDPA_TOO_MANY_USERS)

kpi.name: RNC_1791a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa),0,null,
(100*(aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa)))

kpi_info.title: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to CAC rejection
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the shared HSDPA AAL2 resource allocation failure ratio due to Call Admission Control rejection. Includes both internal and external connection rejections.

kpi.kpi_alias: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to CAC rejection

kpi.name: RNC_1792a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa),0,null,
(100*(aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa)))

kpi_info.title: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to External CAC rejection
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the shared HSDPA AAL2 resource allocation failure ratio due to External Call Admission Control rejection.

kpi.kpi_alias: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to External CAC rejection

kpi_info.title: TRANSPORT_REJECTED_EXT_HSDPA
kpi_info.use: The number of shared HSDPA AAL2 allocation attempts that were rejected because of external Connection Admission Control. UPDATED:When transport resource request is rejected because of external Connection Admission Control.

kpi.name: RNC_1793a
kpi.formula:
decode( (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa),0,null,
(100*(aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa) / (aalrr.aal2_succeeded_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_ext_hsdpa + aalrr.transport_rejected_int_hsdpa + aalrr.other_rejected_hsdpa)))

kpi_info.title: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to Internal CAC rejection
kpi_info.use: This KPI provides information about the shared HSDPA AAL2 resource allocation failure ratio due to Internal Call Admission Control rejection.

kpi.kpi_alias: Shared HSDPA AAL2 reservations failure ratio due to Internal CAC rejection

kpi_info.title: TRANSPORT_REJECTED_INT_HSDPA
kpi_info.use: The number of shared HSDPA AAL2 allocation attempts that were rejected because of the lack of RNC-internal AAL2 resources. UPDATED:When transport resource request is rejected because of RNC-internal Connection Admission Control.

kpi.name: RNC_732b

kpi_info.title: ATM VCC specific outgoing traffic load
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the outgoing ATM layer traffic load for single ATM VC connection.

kpi.kpi_alias: ATM VCC specific outgoing traffic load

kpi.name: RNC_960b

kpi_info.title: ATM VCC specific incoming traffic load
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the incoming ATM layer traffic load for single ATM VC connection.

kpi.kpi_alias: ATM VCC specific incoming traffic load

kpi_info.title: Average ATM VCC egress throughput
kpi_info.use: Average ATM virtual channel connection egress throughput

kpi_info.title: Average ATM VCC ingress throughput
kpi_info.use: Average ATM virtual channel connection ingress throughput

kpi_info.title: IP Route Accessibility for incoming iub traffic
kpi_info.use: The transport resource request success ratio [%]. This KPI describes the average success rate of the transport resource reservation attempts for IP Route based connections every/selected interface where IP is used.

kpi_info.title: Max Reserved IP based route bandwidth
kpi_info.use: Maximum value of IP bandwidth usage rate, comparing the maximum value of reserved IP layer bit rate against the available bandwidth
